elements.name: panel1
elements.title: Explain in your own words what is meant by "value chain", "value creation" and "supply chain management".

elements.name: question1
elements.title: value chain:
elements.correctAnswer: The value chain refers to all links in the creation process of a product/service, from production to the consumer.

elements.name: question4
elements.title: Added value:
elements.correctAnswer: Value creation is the creation of added value. This process takes place step by step.

elements.name: question2
elements.title: Supply Chain Management:
elements.correctAnswer: Supply chain management (SCM) is also known as "supply chain management", which aims to achieve long-term cooperation in a spirit of partnership between all companies involved. Productivity is increased at all stages of the value chain through agreements and coordinated processes. Costs are reduced in the process.
